title: News for January 2020
content:
[[=]]
**« [[[news-12-2019|December 2019]]] | __[[[news-01-2020|January 2020]]]__ | [[[news-02-2020|February 2020]]] »**
[[/=]]

[[div style="border: 2px solid black; background-color: Moccasin;"]]
= The dynamic nature of this wiki means that linked pages might get moved, renamed, deleted, or replaced. Old news pages remain as time capsules and are not updated to account for these changes.
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]

#header h2 span {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 19px 0;
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}

#header {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news/SCPNewsLogo);
}

#header h2 span::before {
    color: #eee;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #f0f0c0;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #000;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8);
    content: 'Site Correspondence Periodical';
}
[[/module]]


[[size 75%]]This is a series showing off news from the site, articles from the past month[[footnote]] with a rating above 0 [[/footnote]], and fan-content for you to check out and discover! Be sure to leave a comment with your thoughts![[/size]]

++++* Fandom Stuff

* Saunter on over to the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp5000contesthub SCP-5000 Hub] and check out all the entries this contest! And a congratulations to Tanhony who took home the bread with his entry, [/SCP-5000 "Why?"]
* One of the founders and legends on this site, Dr Gears, has come out with a sad announcement - cancer has been found in one of his kidneys. While information past that is still forthcoming, and ultimately up to him to share, he has set up a fundraiser [https://www.gofundme.com/f/repair-a-broken-gear here] to collect money for their medical expenses. Please consider donating if you can!


++++* Featured Articles


* [[[SCP-3737]]] - ("Rainbow Bridge") - //SCP-3737-2 is the collective designation for the inhabitants of SCP-3737, which are various species of animals commonly kept as household pets.// By Pecan

* [[[SCP-001-D]]] - //""You didn't hear? SCP-001 is dead."// By Stormbreath

* [[[The Sacred Djehuti]]] - //WHAT'S THIS? –MOONSTONE BRAVEHEART OF HELHEIM// By Lt Flops and Ayers.

++++* Reviewer's Spotlight Articles



* [[[SCP-2410]]] - ("We Are Beary Sorry") - //SCP-2410 refers to stuffed bears that have experienced an ectoentropic phenomenon…// Written by TheMightyMcB, Crashington, and N_Aepic_Fael, selected by //TheMightyMcB//.

* [[[SCP-4755]]] - ("The Whole World Has Gone Bananas!") - //The following anomaly is Level 6/4755 classified.// Written by Nagiros, selected by //Francis Scalia//.

* [[[SCP-4823]]] - ("When We Are Omnipotent") - //"SCP-4823 is a ripe specimen of Musa acuminata, more commonly known as a Cavendish banana.”// Written by Sebarus, selected by //Kilonova//.

* [[[sometimes-it-s-not-funny | Sometimes It's Not Funny]]] - //jockjamsvol6: Guys, I got some bad news.// Written by kinchtheknifeblade, selected by //Cerastes//.


[[f>toc]]

----

You will notice little '📈' emojis beside some articles. That denotes SCP articles which were under 30 and tales which were under 20 when this edition of site news was posted. Give them a little love! Speaking from personal experience, the most frustrating thing that can happen to an article is not deletion, but stagnating below 20 without any comments. So try to read, vote, and comment on these articles! They're often hidden gems :)

+++ Week of January 1st


++++* SCPs


* 📈 [[[scp-4875| SCP-4875]]] ("Crying Beneath the Desert, Or; Lorem Desertum") - "Gravedigger, gravedigger, release him from this earth, won’t you?" Written by LordStonefish.
* [[[scp-4476| SCP-4476]]] ("//Le Famille Natau//") - "haha DISGUSTING" Written by MalyceGraves.
* 📈 [[[scp-4592| SCP-4592]]] ("There is Music in the Void") - Thank goodness. It was getting lonely in this void. Written by IAmtheBushman.
* [[[scp-4438| SCP-4438]]] ("FOURTH") - "hold on i think i left my upvote inside the computer i need to ju-" Written by Tanhony.
* 📈 [[[scp-4461| SCP-4461]]] ("I'm a fan.") - Not the spinning kind. Or is it? Written by DrUnoriginal.
* 📈 [[[scp-4896| SCP-4896]]] ("Corvid Knife") - SQUAWK SQUAWK! Written by Dr Raveren.
* 📈 [[[scp-010-int| SCP-010-INT]]] ("Become one in the Light") - The tower of Babel beckons. Written by INT_Translator.
* 📈 [[[scp-4594| SCP-4594]]] ("There's a gullet beneath London") - I wonder if it tastes like piss and vinegar? Written by Kid F.
* [[[scp-4874| SCP-4874]]] ("Friends With You") - That's all I want to be. Written by Ellie3.
* [[[scp-4892| SCP-4892]]] ("The Rotten God") - You are outnumbered. Written by Tanhony.
* 📈 [[[scp-4728| SCP-4728]]] ("Deletion") - Remember to replace. Written by faminepulse.
* [[[scp-4894| SCP-4894]]] ("TOOL FOR EVERY USE") - AND A USE FOR EVERY TOOL Written by Nameless Mediocre.
* [[[scp-4861| SCP-4861]]] ("12/11/2030") - Screw you, future me! Written by Tanhony.


++++* Tales

* [[[elliot-and-edna| Elliot & Edna Had a Son Named Tim]]] - "//Dad was born an only child to Elliot and Edna Wilson on the 29th of February, 1956.//" A new installment for the [[[wonder-world|What a Wonderful World]]] canon, written by DarkStuff.
* [[[taking-care-of-the-kids| Taking Care of the Kids]]] - "//What was your dad like, Jude?//" Written by kinchtheknifeblade.
* 📈 [[[little-pleasures| Little Pleasures]]] - "//Researcher Jaeger was not a man to distinguish between "want" and "need" very well.//" Written by Tufto.
* 📈 [[[radio-silenced| Radio Silenced]]] - "//It was not the first time Scip had seen the inside of a Foundation interrogation room, though this was certainly turning into the longest time he had spent in one.//" Written by Jacob Conwell.
* 📈 [[[july-27th-1998-quarry-park-calgary-alberta| July 27th, 1998 Quarry Park, Calgary, Alberta]]] - "//It’s important to note that Greg didn’t look dead, or even like he’d been buried for half a decade.//" Written by toadking07.
* 📈 [[[death-and-the-women| Death and the Women]]] - "//Anouk's first though, oddly, was of the Nutcracker. She had seen the ballet two weeks ago, and three of the performers had danced in stilts to evoke the magic of fairyland.//" Written by OriCat.
* [[[prelude-to-crisis-the-decline-and-fall-of-the-foundation| Prelude to Crisis: The Decline and fall of the Foundation]]] - "//Is the Foundation an idea, protecting the innocents from the tainted knowledge of immortality pills and extraterrestrial life?//" The first chapter of a new series, written by Roget.
* [[[hides-the-face-lies-the-snake-the-sun-in-my-disgrace| In my eyes, indisposed. In disguises no one knows. Hides the face, lies the snake. The sun in my disgrace]]] - "//The whole thing took us 4 years and a not inconsiderable amount of resources.//" Written by Doctor Cimmerian.
* 📈 [[[cigarettebreak| Cigarette Break]]] - "//Tuesdays offered nothing but the mind-numbing boredom of desk work with the promise of plenty more to come.//" Written by ObserverSeptember.
* 📈 [[[denton-and-mcdowell-recover-la-chupacabra-s-pinata-from-a-je| Denton and McDowell Recover La Chupacabra's Pinata from a Jersey Devil]]] - "//Hey fuck you man, New Jersey is awesome//" The latest installment of the [[[the-alchemy-department-hub|Alchemy Department]]] canon, written by DrMagnus.


++++* GoI Format
* [[[eggplant-election-special| Eggplant Election Special]]] - [Deer College] "//The incumbent and front-runner, President Diabolus is the definite favorite; the Antichrist Amendment to the Student Body Constitution actually guarantees it, unless someone can disprove his claim to being the Son of Satan.//" Written by ch00bakka.
* [[[three-musings| Three Musings On How It Might've Happened]]] - [Second Hytoth] "//And as Nestor wandered, he soon realized he was lost in the cosmos. It soon became apparent that something was not right. Thus, the Void spoke//" Written by Oboebandgeek99.




@@ @@




+++ Week of January 8th


++++* SCPs

* [[[scp-4473| SCP-4473]]] ("You Make Me Feel Like") - Nothing happens. Written by Tanhony.
* [[[scp-4953| SCP-4953]]] ("Burger King Himself") - Who is Tyrant Arby? Written by Auxiphor.
* 📈 [[[scp-4734| SCP-4734]]] ("The K-T Extinction Bootstrap") - "FOUNDATION_DECRYPTION_KEY_ACCEPTED" Written by Dr Raveren.
* 📈 [[[scp-4582| SCP-4582]]] ("New (New York, New York) York") - A new (new) article by Jekeled.
* [[[scp-3448-j| SCP-3448-J]]] ("Should Have Taken Him Sleeping") - Death's greatest blunder. Written by Calibold.
* [[[scp-4574| SCP-4574]]] ("Paleolithic Spear Tigers") - life, love, and sacrifice. Written by Weryllium.

++++* Tales

* [[[dad-goes-to-the-zoo| Dad Goes to the Zoo]]] - "//Was there any other animal with a neck as long as the giraffe?//" A new installment for the //What a Wonderful World// canon, written by DarkStuff.
* [[[extra-salty| Salt and Pepper (Extra Salty)]]] - "//Hold my hands. Say my name. Look at me, recognize me. Please. Just for a second, just… to know I'm here, and not… gone. Not again.//" The latest installment of the [[[the-eternal-mxtape|Eternal MxTape]]] series, written by Tsercele.
* [[[kyoufu-0| Kyoufu-0]]] - "//NEVER WIDE ENOUGH//" Written by NatVoltaic.
* 📈 [[[its-all-good| It's All Good]]] - "//Lily stared at the dice, and placed a hand against the side of her head. Then, she laughed.//" Written by Ellie3.
* 📈 [[[the-catching-of-the-sun| The Catching of the Sun]]] - "//There are as many stories about the beginnings of the world as there are slaves in Daevon - that is to say, uncountable, and ever increasing.//" Written by OriCat.
* [[[penny-for-your-thoughts| Penny for Your Thoughts?]]] - "//Cool water splattered against Allen's back as he stared up into the sky.//" Written by Alces_alces.


@@ @@


+++ Week of January 15th


++++* SCPs

* 📈 [[[scp-4541| SCP-4541]]] ("A Toy Story") - Oh boy! Where's Woody? Written by madimot.
* 📈 [[[scp-1964-ex| SCP-1964-EX]]] ("Anomalous Television") - Gonna watch me some Ed, Edd, and Eddy. Written by Tracque_.
* 📈 [[[scp-1340-ru| SCP-1340-RU]]] ("Midnight Transmission") - Late night TV. Written by LanceRadioactive.
* 📈 [[[scp-4834| SCP-4834]]] ("All Roads Lead To Rome") - Do they, really? Written by Utylike.
* 📈 [[[scp-es-019| SCP-ES-019]]] ("Apocalyptic Headphones") - DOOOOOOM! Written by Ziakial.
* 📈 [[[scp-4191| SCP-4191]]] ("Draco ignem") - Everyone loves Pyro! Written by DL_Baryonyx.
* 📈 [[[scp-4741| SCP-4741]]] ("Rolling Them Bones") - Roll tide! Uh, I mean bones! Written by SleepSpell.
* 📈 [[[scp-4483| SCP-4483]]] ("Cut off the Head") - It's simple. Cut off G S Palmer's head.

++++* Tales

* 📈 [[[blake-tillerson| Blake Tillerson]]] - "//There is a time in everyone's life, when we look, talk, and act nothing like who we have been, and who we will become.//" Written by DarkStuff.
* 📈 [[[elae| Elä]]] - "//Don’t die.//" Written by OriCat.
* [[[the-weight| The Weight]]] - //"Changing my name so I can work for the Foundation just put it into the ground.//" Written by Doctor Cimmerian.
* 📈 [[[hills-like-white-elephants| The Crisis: Hills Like White Elephants]]] - "//When you're done, I'm ready to talk about your way of thinking. I'm maybe, maybe, coming around to it.//" Written by Roget.
* [[[the-peculiar-case-of-custodian-woodworth-and-dr-bright| The Peculiar Case Of Custodian Woodworth and Dr. Bright]]] - "//Joe was sweeping that night when he encountered Bright for the last time.//" Written by hawkguyy.
* 📈 [[[the-hearts-strings-fear-death-and-immortality| The Hearts Strings: Fear, Death, And Immortality]]] - "//We, at the Foundation, do hold some of the most horrible, horrifying things in the universe.//" Written by KaraKatt.
* 📈 [[[the-hearts-strings-being-a-part-of-one-of-those-families| The Hearts Strings: Being A Part of One of THOSE Families]]] - "//I don’t love my family anymore. I don’t enjoy being in their presence.//" Written by KaraKatt.
* [[[young-foundation| Young Foundation]]] - "//I’ll get the mask and meet you in the backyard in three minutes. Better hurry!//" Written by involuntarybookclub.
* 📈 [[[oria| Oria]]] - "//…ping…//" Written by Dimadude.
* [[[a-scene-from-a-meme| A Scene From A Meme(-ory)]]] - "//Heather, I'm thirty-one years old!//" Written by Lt Flops.
* 📈 [[[diving-in-the-san-diego-sea| Diving in the San Diego Sea]]] - "//If you were a boy who wasn't thinking about girls by freshman year of high school, you were going to by sophomore year, and if you weren't thinking about girls by sophomore year of high school, then there might have been a closet involved.//" Written by DarkStuff.
* 📈 [[[home-sick| Home Sick]]] - "//I mean, I bet I can find something out there…//" Written by Ellie3.
* [[[no-cars-allowed| No Cars Allowed]]] - "//There's a food truck here?//" Written by Ellie3.
* 📈 [[[sheer-heart-attack| The Drooling Path: Part 2]]] - "//I don't recognize the bodies in the water either.//" Written by Kothardarastrix.
* 📈 [[[i-heart-the-circus-3| Pt. <3 - Wherever you go, I'll follow]]] - "//Oi, gilly. Yous' prolly hungry now, eh?//" Written by MalyceGraves.
* 📈 [[[snow-is-hell| Snow Is Hell]]] - "//Kase mailed his sister a framed picture of him, Irene, and the ghosts.//" Written by Weryllium.


++++* GoI Format
* 📈 [[[uiu-file-2019-031| UIU File 2019-031]]] - [Unusual Incidents Unit] "//Hey uh so uh I'm calling up to report uh my neighbor. She lives at uh 23 Cutts Avenue. Uh so it's like, uh 3am right… and uh it sounds like she's hammering something a bunch.//" A new installment for the [[[broken-masquerade-hub|Broken Masquerade]]] canon, written by cybersqyd.
* [[[ambrose-backdoor-soho| Ambrose Backdoor Soho]]] - [Ambrose Restaurants] "//Sicilian pizza made with buffalo mozarella and a creamy tomato sauce, topped with out-of-this-world fresh tomatoes and basil, bred by reclusive parabotanist Stella Lindholm. Let the world melt around you with each taste.//" A new installment for the [[[the-trashfire|Trashfire]]] canon, written by UraniumEmpire.




@@ @@

+++ Week of January  22nd


++++* SCPs

* 📈 [[[scp-3567| SCP-3567]]] ("Chrono-Wrap") - Not Trigger, but Wrap! Written by torcsandantlers.
* [[[scp-4832| SCP-4832]]] ("📻 👌") - 📃👌 Written by H0dari.
* 📈 [[[scp-3193| SCP-3193]]] ("Christmas War") - THE WAR --ON-- CHRISTMAS Written by DrAkimoto.
* 📈 [[[scp-4568| SCP-4568]]] ("Dilemma of the Twin Serpents") - the earthquakes, jim! Written by Logarithmika.
* [[[scp-4524| SCP-4524]]] ("A Flesh, New World") - The fleshy new take on the Aladdin classic. Written by BlueJones.
* 📈 [[[scp-4273| SCP-4273]]] ("The Bonsai Trees") - Tiny, tender trees. Written by Marcelles_Raynes.
* [[[scp-3529| SCP-3529]]] ("snake = snek = cute ^~^") - Surprisingly not written in Python. Written by XilasCrowe.
* 📈 [[[scp-4718| SCP-4718]]] ("Unsinkable") - Just like the Titanic. Written by swordlover87.
* [[[scp-4109| SCP-4109]]] ("**FINAL CONCLUSION:** EVERYTHING IS TERRIBLE") - yeah, I agree. Written by Deadly Bread.
* [[[scp-4564| SCP-4564]]] ("Butthole Surfers") - "//They were all in love with dyin' / They were drinking from a fountain / That was pouring like an avalanche / Coming down the mountain//" Written by Dr Balthazaar.

++++* Tales


* 📈 [[[the-beginnings-of-love| The Beginnings of Love]]] - "//In an entirely new social circle, Tim could have made fast friends if it weren't for his studies.//" Written by DarkStuff.
* [[[modern-hauntings-old-charlatanism| Modern Hauntings, Old Charlatanism]]] - "//A Foster the People song was playing on the radio when the aging grey sedan pulled up to the apartment block.//" Written by Ihp.


++++* GoI Format
* [[[the-penitent-man| Herman Fuller Presents: The Penitent Man]]] - [Herman Fuller's Circus of Disqueting] "//As far as freaks go, I’m really quite no’mal. I bleed a lot, and my blood don't coagulate. Simple nuff, right?//" Written by MalyceGraves.

++++* Misc
* [[[the-heart-corner-of-doom| The Heart Corner of Doom AKA The Author Page]]] It's KaraKatt's Author Page!
* [[[h0daris-author-page| H0dari's Author Page]]] It's H0dari's Author Page!
* [[[oricat-author-page| Oricat's Author Page]]] It's OriCat's Author Page!

Make sure to check out the entries!

-----
+++ 2019 in Review

++++ Highest Rated SCPs of the Year
**1st:** [[[SCP-4205]]] - "[[span style="display: inline-block; background: #1e1e1e; color: #ccc; padding: 0 2px; border-radius: 3px;"]]**{{In The Eyes of the Beholder}}** 🖳 [[/span]]" by Woedenaz
**2nd:** [[[scp-mystery-j|SCP-MYSTERY-J]]] by Uncle Nicolini
**3rd:** [[[SCP-1322-J]]] - "A Whole New World" by Cerastes

++++ Highest Rated Tales of the Year
**1st:** [[[your-very-last-scp|Your Very Last SCP!]]] by The Great Hippo
**2nd:** [[[letters-to-my-future-self|letters to my future self]]] by Athosnetwork
**3rd:** [[[stormsite19|#stormsite19]]] by Uncle Nicolini

++++ Highest Rated GoI Formats of the Year
**1st:** [[[nicos-stupid-proposal|Uncle Nicolini's Proposal... Maybe.]]] by Uncle Nicolini
**2nd:** [[[project-proposal-2014-1221|Project Proposal 2014-1221: Finally Waking Up]]] by Uncle Nicolini
**3rd:** [[[critter-profile-bartholomew|Critter Profile: Bartholomew!]]] by Lt Flops and Kindlyturtleclem
@@ @@




@@ @@
+++ Highest Rated Pages Per Month

++++ January

**SCP:** [[[SCP-4205]]] - "[[span style="display: inline-block; background: #1e1e1e; color: #ccc; padding: 0 2px; border-radius: 3px;"]]**{{In The Eyes of the Beholder}}** 🖳 [[/span]]" by Woedenaz
**Tale:** [[[orientation-for-the-pastaphysics-department|Orientation for the Pastaphysics Department]]] by Doctor Cimmerian
**GoI Format:** [[[para-puppies|'Para-Pedigrees' PED464/CAN33/LUP22]]] by Uncle Nicolini
-----
++++ February

**SCP:** [[[pedantique-s-proposal|Pedantique's Proposal]]] by Pedantique

@@ @@
+++ Editorials' Picks

[[collapsible show="+ Click to Reveal!" hide="- Click to Close"]]
++++* Uncle Nicolini

T Rutherford has had a very strong premiere as a new author. I highly recommend reading their work, which is available [[[t-rutherford-author-page|here.]]] Keep an eye on them heading into 2020!

Woedenaz has developed a tasteful collection of themes that use impressive CSS and design skills. They are viewable [[[/woedenaz/offset/1|here.]]]

And last but not least, here is my favorite art piece from last year:

= [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-952/HighwayAsh.png style="width:50%"]]
Made by Woedenaz for uraniumempire for the 2019 Art Exchange. It's a beautiful rendition of the album in Uranium's [[[SCP-952]]]!
-----
++++* UraniumEmpire

Tsercele started off with [[[SCP-4581]]] and hit the g-ddamn ground running! Keep an eye on their hit series, [[[The Eternal MxTape]]].

The best skip of the year, in my humble opinion, was [[[SCP-4504]]]. If you've got some time, give it a read!
-----
++++* TheMightyMcB
kybard showed up out of the blue and just started kicking ass and taking names! Be sure to check him out at [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kybard|his author page]]] and read all three of his skips, because they're excellent.

One of my favorite skips from 2019, and one that I find to be massively underrated, was [[[SCP-3638]]] "You Can't Be Serious!", by 440 Hertz. It even has a really fun collaborative art page!
-----
++++* gee0765

I recommend [[[SCP-4338]]], [[[SCP-3272]]], [[[SCP-4368]]], and [[[SCP-4357]]].

My favorite breakout author of the year was none other than T Rutherford!
-----
++++* Vincent Van Gone

My favorite SCP of the year was [[[SCP-4390]]], and Tanhony really popped off this year!
-----
++++* Croquembouche

I highly recommend you check out the End of Death subseries, [[[the-existential-maw-of-despair-national-park|Lookout 281.]]]
-----
++++* A Random Day

MUCKSCAPE/MEGAGRID/MAYHEM series (https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/muckscape-megagrid-mayhem-hub); Maim The Sky, Slay the Sun series (https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/maim-the-sky-slay-the-sun-hub) are my picks.

There was exactly one author i can remember who wrote good-ass shit last year and his name is pedantique.
-----
++++* MalyceGraves

[[[SCP-4140]]], [[[Breakneck]]], [[[SCP-4840]]], [[[SCP-4372]]] and the new author Hatcheye are my picks.
-----
++++* Elenee FishTruck

Some great content got made for the International Group of Interest competition! I'd recommend you all check out the [[[sky-sermon-hub|Sky Sermon series]]], [[[non-prophet-organization-hub|A Non-Prophet Organization series]]], and [[[SCP-4775]]] and [[[SCP-4642]]] for the Meat Circus GoI!

My pick for best new author is [[[oricat-author-page|OriCat]]]. Go read some of their tales, especially, their Daevite-centric ones.
-----
++++* Roget

[[[adoption-poster-darius| Mr. DARE]]] is the best thing produced on the SCP Wiki in 2019. Try to prove me wrong. You can’t. It’s wickedly funny and made Wilson’s go from a group I had a positive opinion of to a favorite.

[[/collapsible]]

-----

/*
This tooltip hover effect is adapted from LurkD's code on https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/command-query-separation
*/
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span { display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: -5px;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: rgba(245, 245, 245, 0.95);
    border-style: double;
    border-color: #fff;
    color: #b01;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 1em;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]

----
+* Q&A:

++* Q: Can I replace a blurb that you wrote for one of my articles with my own? I'm not satisfied with it.

A: Absolutely. You will always have that option at any point.

++* Q: I noticed an error/typo/incorrect information and wish to correct it. May I?

A: Sure! If the changes are not limited to your own article(s) and/or are substantial changes across multiple entries, you should post in that month's discussion page and then make the changes.

++* Q: I wrote an article and it seems to have stuck. Can I send a blurb of mine to one of the frequent collaborators?

A: Yup! It's much easier if you come to us about it, and it gives you the control over what you want shown on the news page.
